backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor and all core data types for sessions, documents, channels, messages, uploads, and images, including storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains humanâ€‘written summaries for major frontend files describing their roles and behaviors.
frontend/docs/regression-test-plan-playe: Markdown regression test plan covering image and file upload workflows for player and session documents.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS layers and OKLCH-based theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting early theme mode and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling identity, actor initialization, profile setup, session persistence, routing, and failure recovery.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: React error boundary that displays an error screen with reload and clear-data options.
frontend/src/components/app/Initializati: Shows initialization errors with retry and clear-data actions, including timeout handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChannelChat: Chat view handling message sending, dice roll commands, and image uploads with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatMessage: Renders individual chat messages with timestamps, roll indicators, avatars, and optional images.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCom: Displays and manages document comments, including adding and deleting with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentCon: Parses document content for file markers and renders text, images, or downloadable file attachments.
frontend/src/components/docs/DocumentEdi: Document editor supporting content editing, file uploads, image insertion, preview mode, and saving.
frontend/src/components/docs/ImageUpload: Dialog component for selecting, validating, and uploading an image with an optional title.
frontend/src/components/docs/PlayerDocum: Full editor view for player documents with saving, file uploads, image insertion, and preview mode.
frontend/src/components/profile/Avatar.t: Displays a user avatar with fallback initials and error handling for broken images.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Section for uploading, previewing, and removing a user's profile picture with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/session/ChannelM: Dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting session channels with validation and actor API calls.
frontend/src/components/session/Document: Dialogs for creating, renaming, locking, and deleting documents in a session using actor actions.
frontend/src/components/session/HostSess: Provides UI and logic for exporting and importing session data, including file parsing, saving state, confirmation dialogs, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/session/MembersC: Implements dialogs for creating, renaming, and deleting member channels with validation, mutation calls, and error display.
frontend/src/components/session/PlayerDo: Contains dialogs and menus for creating, renaming, deleting, and toggling visibility of player-owned documents using related mutations.
Displays a list of player documents, allows creation of new ones, and enables selecting a document to open it.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionD: Manages session-wide documents with UI for listing, creating, renaming, deleting, and selecting documents via dialogs and dropdown actions.
frontend/src/components/session/SessionS: Renders a sidebar for selecting and managing channels and member channels, with create dialogs and identity-based permissions.
frontend/src/components/settings/PreLobb: Provides a settings screen for theme, background, nickname, and template management, with file handling and preference updates.
frontend/src/config/polling.ts: Defines polling intervals for messages, lists, session info, and document content.
Implements a preferences context with load/save/reset logic and applies theme updates to the document.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithErrorHand: Wraps useActor with timeout-based error detection and a refetch mechanism for actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentComments.t: Provides queries and mutations for listing, adding, updating, and deleting document comments using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentFiles.ts: Handles listing, fetching, and uploading document file references with validation and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentImages.ts: Manages listing and adding images to documents or player documents, with backend calls and query refreshes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerDocuments.ts: React-query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, editing, renaming, deleting, and updating visibility of player documents via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/usePolling.ts: A simple polling hook that repeatedly runs a callback at a given interval when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreferences.ts: Re-exports the usePreferences hook from the PreferencesContext for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionData.ts: Fetches session, channels, members channels, and messages with polling, and provides mutations for managing members' channels.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionDocuments.t: React-query hooks for CRUD operations on session documents using the actor API with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Fetches and returns a user's display name, falling back to a shortened principal if unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for retrieving, saving, and modifying user profiles, including profile picture removal, with proper query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark themes with a green-accent color palette.
frontend/src/lib/clearLocalAppData.ts: Clears specific app-related localStorage keys and all sessionStorage, handling errors safely.
frontend/src/lib/documentFileMarkers.ts: Utility functions for creating, parsing, inserting, and removing file marker tags embedded in document text.
frontend/src/lib/documentImageMarkers.ts: Parses, creates, inserts, and removes custom [IMAGE:id:caption] markers in text.
frontend/src/lib/preferencesStorage.ts: Loads, saves, and resets user UI preferences in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/rollCommand.ts: Parses dice roll strings, performs random rolls, and formats roll results.
frontend/src/lib/sessionExportFile.ts: Creates, downloads, and imports session export JSON files with version checks.
frontend/src/lib/sessionStorage.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears session context data in localStorage.
Manages saving, loading, clearing, and validating session templates in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into readable time or date-time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Handles session hosting/joining UI, validation, and template application before entering a session.
frontend/src/pages/SessionPage.tsx: Manages main session UI including channels, documents, and view switching.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, persist, and clear URL parameters and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, container settings, and adding typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project metadata, known initialization hang issue, and a list of existing feature requests for fixes.
